text: Bernard Marcel Parent (born April 3, 1945 in Montreal, Quebec), better known as Bernie Parent, is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey goaltender. == Other websites == * Category:1945 births Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Conn Smythe Trophy winners Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Living people Category:People from Montreal Category:Philadelphia Flyers players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Memorial Cup winners Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Bernie Parent
